item.title: Israel-Iran live updates: White House 'confident' strikes hit enriched uranium store
item.description: U.S. aircraft attacked three facilities in Iran related to the country's nuclear program on Saturday.

item.title: Sean 'Diddy' Combs trial updates: SDNY to rest Tuesday; defense not calling witnesses
item.description: Sean "Diddy" Combs is charged with sex trafficking and racketeering conspiracy. He has pleaded not guilty.

item.title: WATCH: Delivery driver helps overheating passengers on stopped train
item.description: A food delivery employee was seen on video throwing water bottles to passengers stuck on a train for two hours in the heat.

item.title: WATCH: Car goes airborne after road buckles in the heat
item.description: A section of road buckled and sent a car flying as a heat wave impacted Cape Girardeau, Missouri.

item.title: WATCH: OKC Thunder storm their way to 1st NBA title
item.description: The Oklahoma City Thunder made history to become the 2025 champions, dominating the Indiana Pacers 103-91 in Game 7 of the NBA Finals.
